page.title: 05HEALTH AND FITNESS
page.content: In Britain today there are loads and loads of health fanatics who have been influenced by the Americans. When you walk down Church Street you see joggers,cyclists and even people walking to keep fit. I do all these activities but somehow never seem to be any healthier. This is probably due to the many varieties of foods containing fat. They may be cakes,chips (or anything fried in fat) .You think of fat as a really disgusting thing but when you are sitting down with you feet up eating a fresh cream chocolate eclair you don't think of it then. Many people are turning vegetarian. This is a popular health trend. Vegetarians live on fruit,nuts,vegetables and wholemeal bread.Idon't think Icould survive without having meat,cakes or chips.
